name: 李旻璁
objective: This course aims to improve the understandings of students in molecular simulation method. Students will learn to re-examine their own research results in a different aspect using computational simulation. Students are also welcome to formulate research tasks for their own research projects.
schedule:
1. Introduction for simulations in engineering, Linux platform, open-source programs, Web of Science, EndNote, etc. (1 wk)
2. Literature survey (1 wk)
3. Presentation -- molecule simulation for your undergrad research (3 wks)
4. Visualization tool (1 wk)
5. Simulation tool -- Molecular Dynamics simulations (1 wk)
6. Simulation tool -- Monte Carlo simulations (1 wk)
7. Simulation tool -- Quantum chemical calculations (1 wk)
8. Simulation tool -- Monte Carlo simulations (1wk)
9. Simulation tool -- Coarse-grained simulation (1wk)
10. Course project (6 wks)
scorePolicy:
Literature survey: 80%
Term project: 20%
Class anticipation -- minus 10 points per absence
